title: Amend a Radiology Report
description: A radiologist needs to add an addendum to a report they signed earlier in the day to include an additional finding.

tasks.description: Locate the original, signed report in the RIS.
Create an addendum to the report.
tasks.expected_outcome: Radiologist opens a new section of the report specifically for addendums.

tasks.description: Dictate the additional finding and sign the addendum.
tasks.expected_outcome: The addendum is added to the original report, and an alert is sent to the ordering provider about the updated result.
